articles.author: Rebecca Cohen
articles.title: Council of Europe takes down Russian flag after expelling country - Business Insider
articles.description: "The Russian Federation ceases to be a member of the Council of Europe as from today, after 26 years of membership," the organization said Wednesday.
articles.content:
Photos show officials from the Council of Europe taking down the Russian flag outside its headquarters after the country was removed from the organization on Wednesday. 
"In an extraordinary meeting… [+1555 chars]
